item.title: Introduction to Nextflow
item.description: Currently learning Nextflow to wrap my workflow in a structural way. Here are some useful resources: Official website: https://www.nextflow.io/ nf-core: https://nf-co.re/ Learning documentation: https://training.seqera.io/ I also start writing my script in nexflow. You can find more detail in here on my github.
